description: This file defines and configures multiple AI agents and teams for a demo playground, including their models, tools, and interactions, primarily for a project involving AI-powered analysis and research.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific capabilities, models, and configurations.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with shared objectives and configurations.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: A class to set up and serve a demo environment for agents and teams.

methods.name: serve_playground_app
methods.description: Function to serve the playground app.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Method to retrieve the configured application instance.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Method to start serving the playground application.
